Rulings.Edison:
●Tributing 1 other monster you control is an effect, not a cost.
●If you Tribute “Lich Lord, King of the Underworld” for this effect, it will return to your hand.
●This effect is activated at the point in the Damage Step where monsters destroyed by battle are sent to the GY.

PSCT.Base: There can only be 1 "Earthbound Immortal" monster on the field. If there is no face-up Field Spell Card on the field, destroy this card. Your opponent cannot target this card for attacks. This card can attack your opponent directly. If this card would be destroyed by battle, you can Tribute 1 other monster instead, and if you do, halve your opponent's LP.
